nhc_headline: ...HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT INVESTIGATING BERYL... ...EXPECTED TO BE A HURRICANE NEAR LANDFALL IN TEXAS...
summary:
...HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT INVESTIGATING BERYL... ...EXPECTED TO BE A HURRICANE NEAR LANDFALL IN TEXAS...
 As of 7:00 AM CDT Sat Jul 6
 the center of Beryl was located near 22.7, -91.9
 with movement WNW at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 999 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
